publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5941 Jim Tolson: Congratulations to Carnock Primary Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Carnock Primary School for receiving a very good HM Inspectorate of Education report, published on 16 March 2010; considers that attainment has improved steadily in recent years with an increasing number of pupils exceeding the national level for their age; welcomes the positive contribution made by all the teaching and support staff to the life of the school, and further welcomes the support given to the school by parents, Parent Council and the fundraising group.
